name: lightEffect_turnOn
description: This function is used to activate a specified light effect on a device for a set duration.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to apply the light effect.

parameters.name: predefinedLightEffect
parameters.description: The specific light effect to be applied (e.g., wake-up mode, gradual brightening, sleep mode).

parameters.name: lightEffectTimer
parameters.description: The duration for which the light effect should be applied.

parameters.name: groupAction
parameters.description: Whether the action applies to a group of devices.
